Text: It's the method used by fanatics to 'prove' they are right, for instance, the neonazis and their Leuchter Report, that has been proved wrong and its author an incompetent poor devil but they still get mileage out of it lying that it is a 'scientific' report... Fortunately, lies don't get anybody very far anbd sooner or later people see through them and their faulty use of logic.
